verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses בֹּ֖א <WH935> Go אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> in unto Pharaoh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I הִכְבַּ֤דְתִּי <WH3513> for I have hardened אֶת־ <WH853> לִבּוֹ֙ <WH3820> his heart וְאֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֣ב <WH3820> and the heart עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> of his servants לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> because of שִׁתִ֛י <WH7896> that I might shew אֹתֹתַ֥י <WH226> these my signs אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> before

וּלְמַ֡עַן <WH4616> because of תְּסַפֵּר֩ <WH5608> And that thou mayest tell בְּאָזְנֵ֨י <WH241> in the ears בִנְךָ֜ <WH1121> of thy son וּבֶן־ <WH1121> and of thy son's בִּנְךָ֗ <WH1121> son אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and how הִתְעַלַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH5953> what things I have wrought בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹתֹתַ֖י <WH226> and my signs אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> and how שַׂ֣מְתִּי <WH7760> which I have done בָ֑ם וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> among them that ye may know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> how that I [am] the LORD

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came in מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹן֮ <WH175> and Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹה֒ <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים <WH5680> of the Hebrews עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֣י <WH4970> How long מֵאַ֔נְתָּ <WH3985> wilt thou refuse לֵעָנֹ֖ת <WH6031> to humble מִפָּנָ֑י <WH6440> thyself before שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> me? let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <WH5647> that they may serve

כִּ֛י <WH3588> Else אִם־ <WH518> if מָאֵ֥ן <WH3986> if thou refuse אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> to let my people הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> will I bring מָחָ֛ר <WH4279> behold to morrow אַרְבֶּ֖ה <WH697> the locusts בִּגְבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1366> into thy coast

וְכִסָּה֙ <WH3680> And they shall cover אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֣ין <WH5869> the face הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no יוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> that one cannot be able לִרְאֹ֣ת <WH7200> to see אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְאָכַ֣ל ׀ <WH398> and they shall eat אֶת־ <WH853> יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> the residue הַפְּלֵטָ֗ה <WH6413> of that which is escaped הַנִּשְׁאֶ֤רֶת <WH7604> which remaineth לָכֶם֙ מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבָּרָ֔ד <WH1259> unto you from the hail וְאָכַל֙ <WH398> and shall eat אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every הָעֵ֔ץ <WH6086> every tree הַצֹּמֵ֥חַ <WH6779> which groweth לָכֶ֖ם מִן־ <WH4480> out הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> for you out of the field

וּמָלְא֨וּ <WH4390> And they shall fill בָתֶּ֜יךָ <WH1004> thy houses וּבָתֵּ֣י <WH1004> and the houses כָל־ <WH3605> of all עֲבָדֶיךָ֮ <WH5650> of all thy servants וּבָתֵּ֣י <WH1004> and the houses כָל־ <WH3605> of all מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4713> Egyptian אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> neither רָא֤וּ <WH7200> have seen אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> which neither thy fathers וַאֲב֣וֹת <WH1> nor thy fathers' אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1> fathers מִיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> since the day הֱיוֹתָם֙ <WH1961> came עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> that they were upon the earth עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיִּ֥פֶן <WH6437> And he turned וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> himself and went out מֵעִ֥ם <WH5973> from פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> from Pharaoh

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <WH559> said עַבְדֵ֨י <WH5650> servants פַרְעֹ֜ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh's אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about עַד־ <WH5704> to him מָתַי֙ <WH4970> How יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become זֶ֥ה <WH2088> will this לָ֙נוּ֙ לְמוֹקֵ֔שׁ <WH4170> unto him How long shall this man be a snare שַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> the men וְיַֽעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> that they may serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God הֲטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> thou not yet תֵּדַ֔ע <WH3045> knowest כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָבְדָ֖ה <WH6> is destroyed מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> that Egypt

וַיּוּשַׁ֞ב <WH7725> were brought again אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> and Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to לְכ֥וּ <WH1980> [but] who [are] they that shall go עִבְד֖וּ <WH5647> serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God מִ֥י <WH4310> Who וָמִ֖י <WH4310> Who הַהֹלְכִֽים׃ <WH1980> Go

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses בִּנְעָרֵ֥ינוּ <WH5288> with our young וּבִזְקֵנֵ֖ינוּ <WH2205> and with our old נֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> shall go בְּבָנֵ֨ינוּ <WH1121> with our sons וּבִבְנוֹתֵ֜נוּ <WH1323> and with our daughters בְּצֹאנֵ֤נוּ <WH6629> with our flocks וּבִבְקָרֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH1241> and with our herds נֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> shall go כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חַג־ <WH2282> for we [must hold] a feast יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לָֽנוּ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> about יְהִ֨י <WH1961> to them כֵ֤ן <WH3651> Thus יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto them Let the LORD עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> you כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> if אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> be so with you as I will let you go אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> טַפְּכֶ֑ם <WH2945> and your little ones רְא֕וּ <WH7200> look כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> [to it] for evil נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> is in פְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> [is] before

לֹ֣א <WH3808> Not כֵ֗ן <WH3651> so לְכֽוּ־ <WH1980> Go נָ֤א <WH4994> now הַגְּבָרִים֙ <WH1397> now ye [that are] men וְעִבְד֣וּ <WH5647> and serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you מְבַקְשִׁ֑ים <WH1245> for that ye did desire וַיְגָ֣רֶשׁ <WH1644> And they were driven out אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> presence פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> from Pharaoh's פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses נְטֵ֨ה <WH5186> Stretch out יָדְךָ֜ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> over the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt בָּֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <WH697> for the locusts וְיַ֖עַל <WH5927> that they may come up עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> upon the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְיֹאכַל֙ <WH398> and eat אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> every herb הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הִשְׁאִ֖יר <WH7604> hath left הַבָּרָֽד׃ <WH1259> [even] all that the hail

וַיֵּ֨ט <WH5186> stretched forth מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> מַטֵּהוּ֮ <WH4294> his rod עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> over the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> of Egypt וַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> and the LORD נִהַ֤ג <WH5090> brought ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> wind קָדִים֙ <WH6921> an east בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> upon the land כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> all that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> and all [that] night הַבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> [and] when it was morning הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> become וְר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> wind הַקָּדִ֔ים <WH6921> the east נָשָׂ֖א <WH5375> brought אֶת־ <WH853> הָאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH697> the locusts

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> went up הָֽאַרְבֶּ֗ה <WH697> And the locusts עַ֚ל <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> over all the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיָּ֕נַח <WH5117> and rested בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> in all the coasts מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כָּבֵ֣ד <WH3515> grievous מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> very לְ֠פָנָיו <WH6440> [were they] before לֹא־ <WH3808> had never הָ֨יָה <WH1961> been כֵ֤ן <WH3651> them there were no such אַרְבֶּה֙ <WH697> locusts כָּמֹ֔הוּ <WH3644> according to וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> as they neither after לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> been כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> there be so

וַיְכַ֞ס <WH3680> For they covered אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֣ין <WH5869> the face כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָרֶץ֮ <WH776> of the whole earth וַתֶּחְשַׁ֣ךְ <WH2821> was darkened הָאָרֶץ֒ <WH776> so that the land וַיֹּ֜אכַל <WH398> and they did eat אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> every herb הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> and all the fruit הָעֵ֔ץ <WH6086> of the trees אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הוֹתִ֖יר <WH3498> had left הַבָּרָ֑ד <WH1259> which the hail וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not נוֹתַ֨ר <WH3498> and there remained כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֶ֧רֶק <WH3418> not any green thing בָּעֵ֛ץ <WH6086> in the trees וּבְעֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> or in the herbs הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> through all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיְמַהֵ֣ר <WH4116> in haste פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Then Pharaoh לִקְרֹ֖א <WH7121> called לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> for Moses וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> and Aaron וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said חָטָ֛אתִי <WH2398> I have sinned לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God וְלָכֶֽם׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now שָׂ֣א <WH5375> Now therefore forgive נָ֤א <WH4994> please חַטָּאתִי֙ <WH2403> I pray thee my sin אַ֣ךְ <WH389> only הַפַּ֔עַם <WH6471> only this once וְהַעְתִּ֖ירוּ <WH6279> and intreat לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God וְיָסֵר֙ <WH5493> that he may take away מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and רַ֖ק <WH7535> but אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּ֥וֶת <WH4194> from me this death הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this
וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> And he went out מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> from Pharaoh וַיֶּעְתַּ֖ר <WH6279> and intreated אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיַּהֲפֹ֨ךְ <WH2015> turned יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> wind יָם֙ <WH3220> west חָזָ֣ק <WH2389> strong מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> a mighty וַיִּשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> which took away אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אַרְבֶּ֔ה <WH697> the locusts וַיִּתְקָעֵ֖הוּ <WH8628> and cast יָ֣מָּה <WH3220> sea סּ֑וּף <WH5488> them into the Red לֹ֤א <WH3808> not נִשְׁאַר֙ <WH7604> there remained אַרְבֶּ֣ה <WH697> locust אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> not one בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> in all the coasts מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיְחַזֵּ֥ק <WH2388> hardened יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> But the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שִׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> so that he would not let the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses נְטֵ֤ה <WH5186> Stretch out יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> toward הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> toward heaven וִ֥יהִי <WH1961> become חֹ֖שֶׁךְ <WH2822> that there may be darkness עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> over the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְיָמֵ֖שׁ <WH4959> [which] may be felt חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> even darkness

וַיֵּ֥ט <WH5186> stretched forth מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> toward הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> toward heaven וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> become חֹֽשֶׁךְ־ <WH2822> darkness אֲפֵלָ֛ה <WH653> and there was a thick בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in all the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> three יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor רָא֞וּ <WH7200> They saw אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> not one אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֗יו <WH251> another וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor קָ֛מוּ <WH6965> neither rose אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> any מִתַּחְתָּ֖יו <WH8478> his place שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> from his place for three יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> but all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel הָ֥יָה <WH1961> had א֖וֹר <WH216> had light בְּמוֹשְׁבֹתָֽם׃ <WH4186> in their dwellings
